振.definition: to shake; to flap; to vibrate; to resonate; to rise up with spirit; to rouse oneself

振作.definition: to bestir oneself; to pull oneself together; to cheer up; to uplift; to stimulate

振奮.definition: to stir oneself up; to raise one's spirits; to inspire

振安.definition: Zhen'an district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning

振安區.definition: Zhen'an district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning

振振有詞.definition: to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions

振振有辭.definition: to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions; also written 振振有詞|振振有词

振聾發聵.definition: lit. so loud that even the deaf can hear (idiom); rousing even the apathetic

振臂一呼.definition: (idiom) to issue a call for action; to raise one's hand and issue a rousing call

振興.definition: to revive; to revitalize; to invigorate; to re-energize

振興區.definition: Zhengxing district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning
